TowingCapacity.Notes: F-450/550 weights shown are for 141-inch wheelbase Regular Cab or 176-inch wheelbase Crew Cab models. For 165, 189, 200 and 201-inch wheelbase models, weights may be somewhat less (usually not more than 400 lbs). Check with you dealer for more details.
